sentences.en: A recurrence of such an oversight could impair our amicable relations.
sentences.cn: 这样的疏忽倘若再发生,可能有损双方的友好贸易关系.

sentences.en: He did it through ( an ) oversight.
sentences.cn: 他由于疏忽才干了这事.

sentences.en: Her name was omitted through an oversight.
sentences.cn: 由于疏忽,她的名字给遗漏了.

sentences.en: I assure you that this was purely an oversight on my part.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证，这纯粹是我的一时疏忽。

sentences.en: I consider this a gross oversight on your part.
sentences.cn: 我把这件事看作是你的一大疏忽.

sentences.en: I didn't mean to leave her name off the list; it was an oversight.
sentences.cn: 我不是有意在名单上漏掉她的名字的，这是个疏忽。

sentences.en: I had the oversight of their collection of books and manuscripts.
sentences.cn: 我负责照管他们收藏的书籍和手稿。

sentences.en: I made the mistake through an oversight.
The mistake was the result of an oversight.
sentences.cn: 这个错误是因疏忽而产生的.

sentences.en: The omission of this chapter from the third edition was a gross oversight.
sentences.cn: 第三版漏印这一章是个大疏忽.

sentences.en: The oversight is not imputable to him.
The oversight issued in heavy loss.
sentences.cn: 这次疏忽造成重大损耗.

sentences.en: The oversight issued in heavy losses.
This error is largely due to my oversight.
sentences.cn: 这个错误主要是由于我一时疏忽而造成的.

sentences.en: Trifling as the matter was, he yet instinctively felt that she was hurt by his oversight.
sentences.cn: 事情虽小, 他却本能地感觉到,她一定因为被他忽视了,而觉得难过.

sentences.en: William was angered and embarrassed by his oversight.
sentences.cn: 威廉因为自己的疏忽而羞愤交加。

trans.tran_cn: 疏忽，监督，照管，失察，负责
trans.tran_en: a mistake in which you forget something or do not notice something
